problem_names: lemma (in interval)  nonmeets2: "\<lbrakk>\<I> u ; \<I> r \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<not> (u\<parallel>r \<and> u = r)"
lemma (in interval) elimmeets: "(p \<parallel> s \<and> (\<exists>t. p \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s) \<and> (\<exists>t. r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> q)) = False"

lemma (in interval) M5exist_var:
assumes "x\<parallel>y" "y\<parallel>z" "z\<parallel>w"
shows "\<exists>t. x\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>w"

lemma (in interval) M5exist_var2:
assumes "p\<parallel>q"
shows "\<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t. r1\<parallel>r2 \<and> r2\<parallel>r3 \<and> r3\<parallel>p \<and> p\<parallel>q \<and> q\<parallel>s \<and> r1\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>s"

lemma (in interval) M5exist_var3:
assumes "k\<parallel>l" and "l\<parallel>q" and "q\<parallel>t" and "t\<parallel>r" 
shows  "\<exists>lqt. k\<parallel>lqt \<and> lqt\<parallel>r"
translations: lemma  (in interval) trans2:"\<lbrakk>p\<parallel>t; t\<parallel>r; r\<parallel>q\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<not>p\<parallel>q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>p \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> r; r \<parallel> q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<not> p \<parallel> q
using M1 meets_asym

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?p \<parallel> ?q; ?p \<parallel> ?s; ?r \<parallel> ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?r \<parallel> ?s
  ?p \<parallel> ?q \<Longrightarrow> \<not> ?q \<parallel> ?p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>p \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> r; r \<parallel> q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<not> p \<parallel> q
by blast
lemma (in interval) nontrans1: "u\<parallel>r \<Longrightarrow> \<not> (\<exists>t. u\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>r)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<parallel> r \<Longrightarrow>
    \<nexists>t. u \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> r
using meets_atrans

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?p \<parallel> ?q; ?q \<parallel> ?r\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<not> ?p \<parallel> ?r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<parallel> r \<Longrightarrow>
    \<nexists>t. u \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> r
by blast
lemma (in interval) nontrans2:"u\<parallel>r \<Longrightarrow> \<not> (\<exists>t. r\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>u)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<parallel> r \<Longrightarrow>
    \<nexists>t. r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> u
using M1 M5exist trans2

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?p \<parallel> ?q; ?p \<parallel> ?s; ?r \<parallel> ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?r \<parallel> ?s
  ?p \<parallel> ?q \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>r s t.
     r \<parallel> ?p \<and>
     ?p \<parallel> ?q \<and>
     ?q \<parallel> s \<and> r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s
  \<lbrakk>?p \<parallel> ?t; ?t \<parallel> ?r; ?r \<parallel> ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<not> ?p \<parallel> ?q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<parallel> r \<Longrightarrow>
    \<nexists>t. r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> u
by blast
lemma (in interval) nonmeets1:"\<not> (u\<parallel>r \<and> r\<parallel>u)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> (u \<parallel> r \<and> r \<parallel> u)
using meets_asym

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?p \<parallel> ?q \<Longrightarrow> \<not> ?q \<parallel> ?p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> (u \<parallel> r \<and> r \<parallel> u)
by blast
lemma (in interval)  nonmeets2: "\<lbrakk>\<I> u ; \<I> r \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<not> (u\<parallel>r \<and> u = r)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<I> u; \<I> r\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<not> (u \<parallel> r \<and> u = r)
using meets_irrefl

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<I> ?p \<Longrightarrow> \<not> ?p \<parallel> ?p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<I> u; \<I> r\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<not> (u \<parallel> r \<and> u = r)
by blast
lemma (in interval) nonmeets3: "\<not> (u\<parallel>r \<and> (\<exists>p. u\<parallel>p \<and> p\<parallel>r))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> (u \<parallel> r \<and>
            (\<exists>p. u \<parallel> p \<and> p \<parallel> r))
using nontrans1

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?u \<parallel> ?r \<Longrightarrow>
  \<nexists>t. ?u \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> ?r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> (u \<parallel> r \<and>
            (\<exists>p. u \<parallel> p \<and> p \<parallel> r))
by blast
lemma (in interval) nonmeets4: "\<not>(u\<parallel>r \<and> (\<exists>p. r\<parallel>p \<and> p\<parallel>u))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> (u \<parallel> r \<and>
            (\<exists>p. r \<parallel> p \<and> p \<parallel> u))
using nontrans2

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?u \<parallel> ?r \<Longrightarrow>
  \<nexists>t. ?r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> ?u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> (u \<parallel> r \<and>
            (\<exists>p. r \<parallel> p \<and> p \<parallel> u))
by blast
lemma (in interval) elimmeets: "(p \<parallel> s \<and> (\<exists>t. p \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s) \<and> (\<exists>t. r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> q)) = False"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<parallel> s \<and>
     (\<exists>t. p \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s) \<and>
     (\<exists>t. r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> q)) =
    False
using meets_atrans

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?p \<parallel> ?q; ?q \<parallel> ?r\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<not> ?p \<parallel> ?r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<parallel> s \<and>
     (\<exists>t. p \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s) \<and>
     (\<exists>t. r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> q)) =
    False
by blast

lemma (in interval) M5exist_var:
assumes "x\<parallel>y" "y\<parallel>z" "z\<parallel>w"
shows "\<exists>t. x\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w
from assms(1,3)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<parallel> y
  z \<parallel> w
have a:"x\<parallel>w \<oplus> (\<exists>t. x\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>w) \<oplus> (\<exists>t. z\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>y)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<parallel> y
  z \<parallel> w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<parallel> w \<oplus>
    (\<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w) \<oplus>
    (\<exists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y)
using M2[of x y z w]

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<parallel> y
  z \<parallel> w
  \<lbrakk>x \<parallel> y; z \<parallel> w\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> x \<parallel> w \<oplus>
                    ((\<exists>t.
                         x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w) \<oplus>
                     (\<exists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<parallel> w \<oplus>
    (\<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w) \<oplus>
    (\<exists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  x \<parallel> w \<oplus>
  (\<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w) \<oplus>
  (\<exists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<parallel> y
  y \<parallel> z
  z \<parallel> w
have b1:"\<not>x\<parallel>w"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<parallel> y
  y \<parallel> z
  z \<parallel> w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> x \<parallel> w
using trans2

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<parallel> y
  y \<parallel> z
  z \<parallel> w
  \<lbrakk>?p \<parallel> ?t; ?t \<parallel> ?r; ?r \<parallel> ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<not> ?p \<parallel> ?q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> x \<parallel> w
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> x \<parallel> w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w
from assms(2)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  y \<parallel> z
have "\<not> (\<exists>t. z\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>y)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  y \<parallel> z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<nexists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y
by (simp add: nontrans2)

proof (state)
this:
  \<nexists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w
with b1 a

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<not> x \<parallel> w
  x \<parallel> w \<oplus>
  (\<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w) \<oplus>
  (\<exists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y)
  \<nexists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y
have " (\<exists>t. x\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>w)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> x \<parallel> w
  x \<parallel> w \<oplus>
  (\<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w) \<oplus>
  (\<exists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y)
  \<nexists>t. z \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>t. x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> w

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in interval) M5exist_var2:
assumes "p\<parallel>q"
shows "\<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t. r1\<parallel>r2 \<and> r2\<parallel>r3 \<and> r3\<parallel>p \<and> p\<parallel>q \<and> q\<parallel>s \<and> r1\<parallel>t \<and> t\<parallel>s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t.
       r1 \<parallel> r2 \<and>
       r2 \<parallel> r3 \<and>
       r3 \<parallel> p \<and>
       p \<parallel> q \<and>
       q \<parallel> s \<and> r1 \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t.
       r1 \<parallel> r2 \<and>
       r2 \<parallel> r3 \<and>
       r3 \<parallel> p \<and>
       p \<parallel> q \<and>
       q \<parallel> s \<and> r1 \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  p \<parallel> q
obtain r3 k1 s  where r3p:"r3\<parallel>p" and  qs:"q\<parallel>s"  and  r3k1:"r3 \<parallel>k1"  and  k1s:"k1\<parallel>s"

proof (prove)
using this:
  p \<parallel> q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>r3 s k1.
        \<lbrakk>r3 \<parallel> p; q \<parallel> s; r3 \<parallel> k1;
         k1 \<parallel> s\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using M5exist

proof (prove)
using this:
  p \<parallel> q
  ?p \<parallel> ?q \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>r s t.
     r \<parallel> ?p \<and>
     ?p \<parallel> ?q \<and>
     ?q \<parallel> s \<and> r \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>r3 s k1.
        \<lbrakk>r3 \<parallel> p; q \<parallel> s; r3 \<parallel> k1;
         k1 \<parallel> s\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  r3 \<parallel> p
  q \<parallel> s
  r3 \<parallel> k1
  k1 \<parallel> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t.
       r1 \<parallel> r2 \<and>
       r2 \<parallel> r3 \<and>
       r3 \<parallel> p \<and>
       p \<parallel> q \<and>
       q \<parallel> s \<and> r1 \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s
from r3p

proof (chain)
picking this:
  r3 \<parallel> p
obtain r2 where r2r3:"r2\<parallel>r3"

proof (prove)
using this:
  r3 \<parallel> p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>r2. r2 \<parallel> r3 \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using M3[of r3] meets_wd

proof (prove)
using this:
  r3 \<parallel> p
  \<I> r3 \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>q r. q \<parallel> r3 \<and> r3 \<parallel> r
  ?p \<parallel> ?q \<Longrightarrow> \<I> ?p \<and> \<I> ?q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>r2. r2 \<parallel> r3 \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  r2 \<parallel> r3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t.
       r1 \<parallel> r2 \<and>
       r2 \<parallel> r3 \<and>
       r3 \<parallel> p \<and>
       p \<parallel> q \<and>
       q \<parallel> s \<and> r1 \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s
from r2r3

proof (chain)
picking this:
  r2 \<parallel> r3
obtain r1 where r1r2:"r1\<parallel>r2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  r2 \<parallel> r3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>r1. r1 \<parallel> r2 \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using M3[of r2] meets_wd

proof (prove)
using this:
  r2 \<parallel> r3
  \<I> r2 \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>q r. q \<parallel> r2 \<and> r2 \<parallel> r
  ?p \<parallel> ?q \<Longrightarrow> \<I> ?p \<and> \<I> ?q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>r1. r1 \<parallel> r2 \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  r1 \<parallel> r2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t.
       r1 \<parallel> r2 \<and>
       r2 \<parallel> r3 \<and>
       r3 \<parallel> p \<and>
       p \<parallel> q \<and>
       q \<parallel> s \<and> r1 \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s
with  assms  r2r3 r3p qs

proof (chain)
picking this:
  p \<parallel> q
  r2 \<parallel> r3
  r3 \<parallel> p
  q \<parallel> s
  r1 \<parallel> r2
obtain t where r1t1:"r1\<parallel>t" and t1q:"t\<parallel>s"

proof (prove)
using this:
  p \<parallel> q
  r2 \<parallel> r3
  r3 \<parallel> p
  q \<parallel> s
  r1 \<parallel> r2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>t.
        \<lbrakk>r1 \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> s\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using M5exist_var

proof (prove)
using this:
  p \<parallel> q
  r2 \<parallel> r3
  r3 \<parallel> p
  q \<parallel> s
  r1 \<parallel> r2
  \<lbrakk>?x \<parallel> ?y; ?y \<parallel> ?z; ?z \<parallel> ?w\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. ?x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> ?w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>t.
        \<lbrakk>r1 \<parallel> t; t \<parallel> s\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  r1 \<parallel> t
  t \<parallel> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t.
       r1 \<parallel> r2 \<and>
       r2 \<parallel> r3 \<and>
       r3 \<parallel> p \<and>
       p \<parallel> q \<and>
       q \<parallel> s \<and> r1 \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s
with assms r1r2 r2r3 r3p qs

proof (chain)
picking this:
  p \<parallel> q
  r1 \<parallel> r2
  r2 \<parallel> r3
  r3 \<parallel> p
  q \<parallel> s
  r1 \<parallel> t
  t \<parallel> s
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  p \<parallel> q
  r1 \<parallel> r2
  r2 \<parallel> r3
  r3 \<parallel> p
  q \<parallel> s
  r1 \<parallel> t
  t \<parallel> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t.
       r1 \<parallel> r2 \<and>
       r2 \<parallel> r3 \<and>
       r3 \<parallel> p \<and>
       p \<parallel> q \<and>
       q \<parallel> s \<and> r1 \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>r1 r2 r3 s t.
     r1 \<parallel> r2 \<and>
     r2 \<parallel> r3 \<and>
     r3 \<parallel> p \<and>
     p \<parallel> q \<and>
     q \<parallel> s \<and> r1 \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> s

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in interval) M5exist_var3:
assumes "k\<parallel>l" and "l\<parallel>q" and "q\<parallel>t" and "t\<parallel>r" 
shows  "\<exists>lqt. k\<parallel>lqt \<and> lqt\<parallel>r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>lqt. k \<parallel> lqt \<and> lqt \<parallel> r
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>lqt. k \<parallel> lqt \<and> lqt \<parallel> r
from assms(1-3)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  k \<parallel> l
  l \<parallel> q
  q \<parallel> t
obtain lq where "k\<parallel>lq" and "lq\<parallel>t"

proof (prove)
using this:
  k \<parallel> l
  l \<parallel> q
  q \<parallel> t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>lq.
        \<lbrakk>k \<parallel> lq; lq \<parallel> t\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using M5exist_var

proof (prove)
using this:
  k \<parallel> l
  l \<parallel> q
  q \<parallel> t
  \<lbrakk>?x \<parallel> ?y; ?y \<parallel> ?z; ?z \<parallel> ?w\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. ?x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> ?w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>lq.
        \<lbrakk>k \<parallel> lq; lq \<parallel> t\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  k \<parallel> lq
  lq \<parallel> t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>lqt. k \<parallel> lqt \<and> lqt \<parallel> r
with assms(4)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  t \<parallel> r
  k \<parallel> lq
  lq \<parallel> t
obtain lqt where "k\<parallel>lqt" and "lqt\<parallel>r"

proof (prove)
using this:
  t \<parallel> r
  k \<parallel> lq
  lq \<parallel> t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>lqt.
        \<lbrakk>k \<parallel> lqt; lqt \<parallel> r\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using M5exist_var

proof (prove)
using this:
  t \<parallel> r
  k \<parallel> lq
  lq \<parallel> t
  \<lbrakk>?x \<parallel> ?y; ?y \<parallel> ?z; ?z \<parallel> ?w\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>t. ?x \<parallel> t \<and> t \<parallel> ?w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>lqt.
        \<lbrakk>k \<parallel> lqt; lqt \<parallel> r\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  k \<parallel> lqt
  lqt \<parallel> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>lqt. k \<parallel> lqt \<and> lqt \<parallel> r
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  k \<parallel> lqt
  lqt \<parallel> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>lqt. k \<parallel> lqt \<and> lqt \<parallel> r
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>lqt. k \<parallel> lqt \<and> lqt \<parallel> r

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
